The Quranic researcher, we sent a speech to you for the lies, the first of the grace, whether they were made, or some of them, so that the tattooing of the absence, which is the lords, is the one O liars of the people of Mecca, a messenger, who witnessed you, witnessing the day of resurrection with what was issued from you from the infidels and disobedience, as we sent to the Pharaoh of the Lord, and it His awareness of his income in the likeness or because it is a knowledgeable one who sings from the Bayan.
